summary: The text discusses the amendments made to the Postal Rules of Nepal, published in the Nepal Gazette. It outlines the various amendments made over the years, including the first, second, third, and fourth amendments. The document also highlights the regulations regarding the size and dimensions of postal items, as well as the requirements for using postal services. Additionally, it emphasizes the need for caution and compliance with the specified rules when sending postal items through the postal service.

summary: The text discusses the Hulak Savings Bank Regulations published in the Nepal Gazette. It includes amendments made to the regulations over the years, outlining the rules and procedures for operating the bank. The regulations cover the establishment of a Savings Bank Advisory Committee and define various types of accounts that can be opened with the bank. The document also specifies the roles and responsibilities of the committee members and provides guidelines for conducting meetings.
